Class FileRingOutputStream.RotateBySize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.basking2.sdsai.io.FileRingOutputStream.RotateBySize

    public static class FileRingOutputStream.RotateBySize
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileRingOutputStream.RotationPredicate
    Return true when a file size is exceeded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RotateBySize

        public RotateBySize(long rotate)

      • RotateBySize

        public RotateBySize(long rotate,
                    java.io.File currentFile)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Construct using a file length as the starting point. If currentFile is a directory, it is assumed that the input file is a FileRing and the FileRing.getCurrentFile(File, String, String) is used to pull the length.
        Parameters:
        rotate - At what size to rotate.
        currentFile - The current file to start the length at.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On error.

      • RotateBySize

        public RotateBySize(long rotate,
                    java.io.File dir,
                    java.lang.String prefix,
                    java.lang.String suffix)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Construct assuming the current file ring.
        Parameters:
        rotate - At what size to rotate.
        dir - The directory that holds the file ring.
        prefix - The prefix.
        suffix - The suffix.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On errors.
